title: Discord Bot and Web Development Commissions
desc: Want a Discord bot or custom website but don't have the time or skills needed to put them together yourself? I'm here to help! I'll develop your bot and/or website to fit your needs all for a fair hourly price, and I can even host them for you! Contact me on Discord @cybahh to get started.

title: TikTok API
desc: A website hosting various endpoints to get rich embeds, direct downloads, and JSON metadata for TikTok videos given a video ID.

title: Discord ChatGPT
desc: A Discord bot that allows users to interact with OpenAI's GPT large language models and DALL-E image generators.

title: CyberFiles Lite
desc: A (not so) bare-bones file index built to work with Node.js Express and look like GitHub's file browser, complete with file previews and more!

title: CyberDeaths
desc: A Spigot Minecraft server plugin that overrides the default death messages with super customizable ones!

title: CyberRename
desc: A simple plugin for Spigot Minecraft servers that allows players to change the name and lore of their items with commands.

title: CyberTPR
desc: A simple random teleportation plugin for Spigot Minecraft servers.

title: Cybot
desc: A Discord bot hosting a whole bunch of slash commands to make your life easier, featuring useful tools like RNG, a link shortener, YouTube video downloader, and more!

title: Cyber's BirthdayBot
desc: A Discord bot created to make your birthday as happy as possible! Set your birthday once, and have it announced in all the servers that you share with the bot.

title: CyberTasks
desc: An easy to use to-do list and task scheduler webapp inspired by Microsoft To-Do and Google Tasks with server side storage.
